text: Andrzej Kobylański () born 31 July 1970 in Ostrowiec Świętokrzyski) is a Polish former professional footballer who played as a striker or midfielder. As of March 2012, Kobylański works as assistant manager for KS Cracovia. Kobylański's father, Alfred Kobylański and his son, Martin Kobylański, have both been professional footballers. == Career == He represented his native country at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona.
